mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (ino, reviewer, rating, review_content) values (#{ino}, #{reviewer}, #{rating}, #{review_content})
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET helpful = helpful + 1 WHERE review_id=#{review_id}
UPDATE reviews SET helpful = helpful - 1 WHERE review_id=#{review_id}
mapper.select: SELECT rating, COUNT(*) AS count FROM reviews WHERE ino = #{ino} GROUP BY rating
